messages.title: A better plan, a better future
messages.content: This election is a choice: please use your postal vote for Labour

leaflet.personalStatement: "I'm standing for election because we need more everyday people who live in the real world to represent us in parliament. Help me bring some common sense policies to Westminster."

contactInformation.address: Labour Central, King's Manor, Newcastle upon Tyne NE1 6PA

images.caption: Lisa Forbes - Your Labour candidate for Peterborough
